author: LISA O‚ÄôDONNELL Staff Reporter
title: School librarians are among positions being cut at WS/FCS
text:
Over the last several weeks, lots of big numbers have been tossed around to describe the depth of Winston-Salem/Forsyth County Schools‚Äô financial crisis.
The numbers seem to change almost weekly, jumping by the millions, to the point that keeping track of them can be head-spinning.
At Tuesday‚Äôs school board meeting, the impact of the district‚Äôs financial mismanagement was told not by numbers but through the stories of media coordinators ‚Äî most of us would call them librarians ‚Äî who told the school board that their work is critical to the success of a school.
Grace Campbell-Sheran told the story of a girl who saw the library in her school as a way to get out of class.
Through Campbell-Sheran‚Äôs gentle mentoring, the girl fell in love with ‚ÄúDork Diaries,‚Äù a series of books aimed at young readers. She became an avid reader.
‚ÄúHer grades went up. Her grades improved because she came into a space thinking she could get away, but we captured her. She mattered, and I cried when she graduated,‚Äù she said.
Campbell-Sheran changed many lives. She was good at her job. In 2023, the school district named her its Instructional Support Person of the Year.
A few days ago, she learned she was losing her job as media coordinator at Konnoak Middle School.
‚ÄúYou talk about expenses. You don‚Äôt take just us out of the position; you take a lifeline,‚Äù Campbell-Sheran said.
With $44 million in cuts to make from its 2025-26 budget, the cost-saving measures are now hitting the employees who make the school district run. Salaries and benefits make up about 85% of the school district‚Äôs budget, leaving the district with few places to turn outside of eliminating positions to better align with what the state allots.
The local district has exceeded the number of positions that the state will pay for.
As principals make decisions on where to save money in their schools, some are choosing to eliminate certified media coordinators, a move that many educators say will be detrimental.
Many of them made the case for keeping them, describing the work of media coordinators as more than putting books on shelves.
‚ÄúThese folks, media coordinators, exude love and joy,‚Äù said Marty Creech, the magnet school coordinator at Konnoak Middle School.
They manage hundreds of school-issued Chromebooks, keep up with changes in technology, including artificial intelligence, write grants and help teachers align their curriculum with relevant materials.
For all their duties in keeping a school humming, the most compelling stories the media coordinators shared were of introducing individual students to the wonder and joy of books, a powerful tool in a school district where more than half of third-graders do not read at grade level.
Caitlyn Berry, a media coordinator at Rural Hall Elementary School, told a story about a young girl wearing a hijab who felt sad as her classmates looked at books in the library about Christmas. Berry said she quickly found some books about Ramadan.
‚ÄúHer whole demeanor changes as she looks at the books I have chosen,‚Äù Berry told the school board.
Not long after, the girls who celebrated Christmas and the girl in the hijab were exchanging stories about their respective holidays.
Berry called it her favorite story of ‚Äúlibrary joy.‚Äù
‚ÄúCurious learners, even the youngest, can use libraries as a place of deeper learning,‚Äù she said.
Those who spoke at the meeting said they wanted the school board to ensure that school libraries will be staffed with certified librarians. The school board took no action on that request.
Amerika Somers, the media coordinator at Paisley Middle School and Lowrance Middle School, said she found out Monday that her position was being reduced by 50%.
‚ÄúLibrarians are the heart of our school communities,‚Äù she said.
She asked school board members to recall their memories of school libraries, the excitement of book fairs and the feeling of being in a safe place. Today‚Äôs children deserve the same memories, she said.
‚ÄúThe consequences (of financial mismanagement) are felt most deeply by our students, especially those who rely on these libraries as a lifeline,‚Äù Somers said.
‚ÄúRe-investing in our position is more than putting books on shelves. It means safeguarding the future of our children, honoring their right to a comprehensive and enriching education and preserving the legacy of safe, nurturing spaces that served you and hopefully will serve future generations as well,‚Äù Somers said, her voice shaking with emotion.

author: (Fotos: iStock
title: Casi la mitad de los adultos consumen alcohol en exceso en M√©xico, seg√∫n encuesta
text:
De la poblaci√≥n mayor de 20 a√±os en M√©xico , 55.5% consume alcohol y 40.4% lo hizo en exceso en los √∫ltimos 12 meses, de acuerdo con datos de la Encuesta Nacional de Salud y Nutrici√≥n (Ensanut) 2022.
Mientras que entre la poblaci√≥n adolescente, de 10 a 19 a√±os, 20.6% ingiere bebidas alcoh√≥licas y, en el √∫ltimo a√±o, 13.9% las consumi√≥ en exceso.
Publicidad Para complementar esos datos, organizaciones civiles de la Red de Acci√≥n sobre Alcohol (RASA) elaboraron otro sondeo sobre el consumo de alcohol.
Los resultados de la Encuesta Reset Alcohol M√©xico 2024 arrojaron que, adem√°s, 83% de la poblaci√≥n ha consumido alcohol alguna vez en la vida y 43% lo hizo en los √∫ltimos 30 d√≠as.
La bebida que m√°s se consume en el pa√≠s es la cerveza (75%), seguida del tequila (29%) y el vino (28%).
Para saber m√°s CDMX SSC analiza alcohol√≠metros para motociclistas ante aumento de muertes De las 1,006 personas entrevistadas, 87% afirma que es f√°cil comprar alcohol y 75% considera que el alcohol que se vende por internet facilita que menores de edad lo adquieran.
Adem√°s, 60% considera que el alcohol es relativamente barato.
Publicidad Lo √∫ltimo Captura de ‚ÄúEl Mayo‚Äù golpea la relaci√≥n M√©xico-Estados Unidos Intento de detenci√≥n de Javier Corral: ¬øcu√°l es su pleito con Maru Campos? "Es tiempo de mujeres... la pol√≠tica se hace con amor", sostiene Sheinbaum Publicidad Alcohol y violencia de g√©nero
De acuerdo con la Encuesta Reset, al 97% de los participantes le preocupa la violencia contra las mujeres provocada por el consumo de alcohol.
‚ÄúEl consumo de alcohol no solo est√° vinculado a los actos de violencia, sino tambi√©n a su intensificaci√≥n. La evidencia tambi√©n sugiere que el consumo de alcohol aumenta la incidencia y la gravedad de la violencia dom√©stica‚Äù, explic√≥ Arturo Sabines, vocero de RASA, en la presentaci√≥n de la Encuesta Reset.
Por ello, las organizaciones acompa√±aron la encuesta con el lanzamiento de la campa√±a "El alcohol da√±a a quienes m√°s amas", con el prop√≥sito de generar conciencia sobre las consecuencias del consumo excesivo y su relaci√≥n con la violencia.
üçªüö®Se calcula que en M√©xico cada a√±o fallecen 39 mil personas por el consumo de alcohol.
Hoy las organizaciones integrantes de la #ReddeAcci√≥nSobreAlcohol presentaron la campa√±a ‚ÄúEl alcohol da√±a a quienes m√°s amas‚Äù sobre esta crisis de salud p√∫blica. https://t.co/UyM9hMc197 pic.twitter.com/n9mK4CQyto
‚Äî Act√∫a por la salud (@actuaporlasalud) August 15, 2024 La campa√±a estar√° presente en redes sociales a trav√©s de videos y banners, adem√°s de incluirse en rutas de camiones y en el sitio web www.accionsobrealcohol.org
En general, el consumo de alcohol es considerado un problema importante o moderado en M√©xico por el 94% de los encuestados y 60% cree que la poblaci√≥n mexicana desconoce los da√±os del alcohol en la salud.
Elecciones 2024 Diputada Luisa Guti√©rrez se enfila a ser la pr√≥xima presidenta del PAN en CDMX El Tribunal, listo para cerrar calificaci√≥n de elecci√≥n presidencial y Congreso Brugada apuesta por "descentralizar" el gobierno y delegar tareas en alcald√≠as ver m√°s Publicidad Publicidad Alcohol y salud
Sin embargo, de los encuestados, 99% considera que el alcohol aumenta el riesgo de enfermedades hep√°ticas; 98% cree que eleva el riesgo de violencia contra las mujeres y de violencia familiar, y 96% dice que el alcohol incrementa el riesgo de ca√≠das y lesiones.
"La evidencia ha demostrado c√≥mo es m√°s probable que las mujeres sufran de violencia por parte de su pareja si est√° alcoholizada y las ri√±as callejeras entre hombres alcoholizados son mucho m√°s comunes si hay alcohol de por medio", explic√≥ Yahaira Ochoa, coordinadora de comunicaci√≥n en Salud Justa Mx.
Adem√°s, 94% sostiene que el alcohol aumenta el riesgo de siniestros y lesiones; 89% afirma que tambi√©n eleva el riesgo de maltrato infantil, y 71% se√±ala que el alcohol aumenta la incidencia de c√°ncer.
Conoce m√°s Internacional Los europeos son los mayores bebedores de alcohol en el mundo, dice la OMS Por ello, 60% de los entrevistados dice que apoyar√≠a el incremento del precio de las bebidas alcoh√≥licas y 84% menciona que est√° a favor de las etiquetas de advertencia en los productos que contienen alcohol.
Otro 83% asevera que su apoyo a los impuestos sobre el alcohol ser√≠a mayor si la recaudaci√≥n se destinara a bienes sociales, en particular a la educaci√≥n o la atenci√≥n sanitaria.
‚ÄúLa ausencia de una pol√≠tica nacional para el control del alcohol en M√©xico que regule su publicidad, sus puntos y horarios de venta y que establezca una pol√≠tica fiscal que incorpore al precio de estos productos los enormes costos en salud y sociales que provoca su consumo, ha contribuido al deterioro de la salud de la poblaci√≥n‚Äù, indic√≥ Alejandro Calvilllo, director de El Poder del Consumidor.
Tags Secretar√≠a de Salud Organizaciones de salud Recomendaciones Econom√≠a La OMS pide m√°s impuestos al alcohol y a las bebidas azucaradas 1 Min Read Tendencias El cerebro se regenera tras 7 meses de no consumir alcohol 2 Min Read M√°s acerca del autor: Expansi√≥n Pol√≠tica @ExpPolitica Newsletter function GetReferrerDomainX() { var preUrl = document.referrer; //console.log("GetReferrerDomainX

author: Aline Oliveira
title: Arthur Picoli e Ivy Moraes comentam sobre BBB 25 sem Boninho
text:
Ap√≥s passarem por edi√ß√µes diferentes do Big Brother Brasil, Arthur Picoli, 30, e Ivy Moraes, 32, que hoje formam um casal, comentaram a sa√≠da de Boninho, antes diretor do reality, da Globo.
O que aconteceu Ivy participou do BBB 20, enquanto Arthur esteve no reality na edi√ß√£o seguinte, em 2021. Juntos, o casal compareceu, na √∫ltima quarta-feira (18), √† festa de 50 milh√µes de seguidores de Virginia Fonseca, na qual Splash esteve presente.
Gratos ao programa, os dois revelaram que sentem um certo ci√∫me das pessoas que entram em novas edi√ß√µes. "Eu vejo as pessoas l√° dentro e penso: 'Ai que raiva, queria estar l√°'", afirmou Ivy. "Compartilho desse ciuminho. Quando vejo algu√©m limpando a piscina, penso: 'Essa da√≠ era a minha tarefa'", completou Arthur.
Milly Lacombe
Urbanista alerta para os riscos do novo Pacaembu
Sakamoto
Tiro √† queima-roupa em SP √© cena tr√°gica e inaceit√°vel
Casagrande
Marcelo no Flu foi como Dani Alves no S√£o Paulo
Alicia Klein
Por que tantas mulheres odeiam futebol
Questionados se o BBB realmente carrega o sentimento de "do BBB para vida", Picoli torce o nariz. "Tem gente que sim, tem gente que n√£o. Mas falo com todo mundo, n√£o √© falando da boca pra fora, n√£o fica m√°goa com ningu√©m", garantiu.
Ver essa foto no Instagram Uma publica√ß√£o compartilhada por Ivy Moraes (@ivymoraes)
Para a edi√ß√£o de 2025, o reality passar√° por uma mudan√ßa fundamental: Boninho n√£o ser√° mais o Big Boss. Em novembro, o diretor anunciou sua sa√≠da da emissora ap√≥s 40 anos.
Ainda que tenha o h√°bito de acompanhar o programa apenas pelas redes sociais, Ivy se demonstrou positiva para o BBB 25, mesmo diante da mudan√ßa. "Tenho certeza que vai ser maravilhoso, porque o [Marcelo] Dourado est√° ali [na dire√ß√£o]. Tenho certeza que ele vai dar uma continuidade maravilhosa. Mas estou curiosa para saber como vai funcionar", confessou.
J√° Arthur, n√£o esconde a gratid√£o que tem por Boninho e, ao ser questionado por Splash se participaria de um novo projeto do diretor em outra emissora, respondeu sem pensar: "Com o Boninho? Eu iria", disse convicto. "Eu gosto dele. Sou muito grato pelo que ele fez na minha vida. Todo dia passa um filme na minha cabe√ßa".

author: Anthony Robledo
title: Viral photo of forlorn Spiral Hot Dogs owner leads to booming business
text: Customer's photo of forlorn owner in empty restaurant leads business to boom at OK diner Nick Chappell had never been to Spirals Hot Dogs & More before he took a photo of Scott Festler in his empty restaurant. But after business boomed, Chappell's part of the Spirals family, Festler says. [Anthony Robledo](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/7612431001/anthony-robledo/) An Oklahoma hot dog joint owner visibly wanted customers one day and he soon got more than he bargained for. During a slow shift on Dec. 20, a customer took a photo of Scott Festler standing by his restaurant entrance waiting for diners and shared it on social media. Festler would soon have no time to stand around as " [Spirals: Hot Dogs & More](https://spiralshotdogs.com/)," in Norman, Oklahoma, saw booming business once the post went viral. "We immediately started doing double digits in sales," Festler told USA TODAY on Thursday. "It happened really fast to me." The day the photo was taken, Festler found himself staring out the window upset his family business of four years wasn't booming as well as others ahead of Christmas. Festler said he had no idea why Spirals saw a sudden wave of new customers after Dec. 20 until the person responsible for posting the photo, Nick Chappell, later apologized and offered to take the post down. Festler wouldn't hear of it. "You just wouldn't expect it. Social media is amazing. It's amazing that people get involved with it," he said. "But more importantly, it's the stuff that you just don't think would work. That's what works." 'I will always love you': [See Dolly Parton grant Utah man's dying wish to meet her](/story/life/humankind/2023/12/26/dolly-parton-meets-longtime-fan/72033945007/) Customer knew he had to capture 'wholesome moment' Chappell visited the Norman area for his job as an Oklahoma Army National Guard. As part of their weekly hot dog Wednesday routine, Chappell and a his co-worker found Spirals on Google Maps and took a chance. Noticing Festler gazing, Chappell decided to capture the "wholesome moment" on Snapchat captioning "He has been standing here waiting on customers to come in." "A good buddy of mine named Chad said, 'Hey, man, you can either post this on Facebook or I'm going to post this on Facebook. Some way or another we're going to get this guy some customers,'" Chappell said. In a Facebook post, Chappell gave an excellent recommendation of the restaurant, complimenting their food and "off the charts" service. He shared a photo of his dish, the menu and of Festler waiting for diners. Chappell was blown away by the success of the post, which has since had over 2,000 shares, and even more surprised to see over 70 guests at the diner during his next visit. "I'm not a huge social media guy I typically don't share," Chappell said. "I don't even know really the words to describe it as but it made me even that much happier that I did make a post." Owner adds new 'Thunderbird' item in customer's honor Festler is showing his gratitude by adding a new item in Chappell's honor. Having named hot dogs and bowls after family members, he was more than happy to do so. The "Thunderbird" is a hot link with bacon, cream cheese and jalape√±os, Festler said. The meal gets its name from the Thunderbird Unit Patch for the 45th Infantry, which Chappell is a part of. The two reconnected at the restaurant on Thursday, where they both got emotional talking about the post's impact. Chappell received a certificate of appreciation during the unveiling of the "Thunderbird" and was told he is now forever part of the Spirals family. "To know that it was a humble guy that just saw our need and did what he could. He doesn‚Äôt have a real following on social media, he hardly ever shares anything and to know that one post had so much power. It was super cool," Festler added.

author: Ana Paula Rodr√≠guez
title: 20 frases de S√°bado Santo 2024: mensajes e im√°genes para compartir con tus amigos y familia
text: El S√°bado Santo se celebra todos los a√±os en el [√∫ltimo d√≠a de la Semana Santa](https://gestion.pe/mix/respuestas/20-tarjetas-de-semana-santa-2024-con-frases-reflexivas-biblicas-y-citas-religiosas-para-enviar-por-whatsapp-este-jueves-viernes-y-domingo-santo-nnda-nnrt-noticia/) y es el d√≠a anterior a Pascua. Este d√≠a se conmemora el desgarrador del infierno y el d√≠a en que el cuerpo de Jes√∫s yaci√≥ en la tumba. Hemos creado para ti una colecci√≥n de 20 frases y mensajes para este s√°bado 30 de marzo que podr√°s compartir con todos. Utilice estos estados y saludos de WhatsApp del S√°bado Santo para desearles a todos en esta ocasi√≥n especial. 20 Frases cortas y bonitos para el S√°bado de Gloria - El S√°bado de Gloria es una oportunidad para reflexionar sobre la muerte y resurrecci√≥n de Jes√∫s. - La muerte de Jes√∫s nos ofrece la salvaci√≥n y el perd√≥n de nuestros pecados. - Recordamos que la muerte de Jes√∫s en la cruz nos trajo salvaci√≥n y nos dio la oportunidad de tener vida eterna con Dios. - La resurrecci√≥n del hijo de Dios nos muestra que la muerte no tiene la √∫ltima palabra y que el Todopoderoso tiene poder, sobre todo, incluso sobre la muerte. - Reflexionemos sobre el amor y la entrega total de Jes√∫s, que se entreg√≥ a s√≠ mismo por nosotros. - La muerte de Jes√∫s en la cruz es un recordatorio de que el amor verdadero implica sacrificio y entrega total, y nos llama a imitar su ejemplo. - Encontremos consuelo y esperanza al saber que Jes√∫s resucit√≥ y est√° vivo, y que nos acompa√±a en cada momento de nuestra vida. - Jes√∫s es la luz en nuestro camino, el refugio en la tormenta y la fuerza en la debilidad. - Aprendimos con el Mes√≠as que no estamos solos en nuestras luchas y dificultades, y que podemos tener confianza en que Dios nos dar√° la fuerza y el consuelo que necesitamos. - Encontremos la fuerza y el coraje para enfrentar nuestros miedos y desaf√≠os, sabiendo que Dios est√° con nosotros y nos gu√≠a en todo momento. - La resurrecci√≥n de Jes√∫s nos invita a vivir con alegr√≠a y esperanza, sabiendo que tenemos un prop√≥sito en la vida y que somos amados por Dios m√°s all√° de nuestras fallas y debilidades. - La resurrecci√≥n de Jes√∫s es la prueba de su divinidad y su poder sobre el pecado y la muerte. - La muerte de Jes√∫s es un acto de amor supremo que nos muestra su misericordia y compasi√≥n. - La resurrecci√≥n de Jes√∫s es la promesa de la vida eterna para quienes creen en √âl. - La muerte de Jes√∫s es una oportunidad para reflexionar sobre nuestra propia mortalidad y la importancia de la vida. - La muerte de Jes√∫s es un recordatorio de que debemos vivir cada d√≠a con amor, compasi√≥n y humildad. - La resurrecci√≥n de Jes√∫s es un mensaje de esperanza para todos los que sufren y se sienten desesperados. - En el S√°bado de Gloria, recordamos que la vida es m√°s fuerte que la muerte. - La muerte de Jes√∫s nos muestra que el amor es m√°s poderoso que cualquier otra fuerza en el universo. - Cada d√≠a nos demuestra que su gran amor sacia nuestra sed y es el pan de vida que nos nutre y nos fortalece. - La resurrecci√≥n de Jes√∫s nos da la fuerza y la esperanza necesarias para superar cualquier adversidad. - La muerte de Jes√∫s es la demostraci√≥n de su amor incondicional por la humanidad. - En el S√°bado de Gloria, celebramos la vida y la esperanza que Jes√∫s nos ofrece. - Jes√∫s nos llama a amarnos los unos a los otros, como √©l nos ha amado, sin importar nuestras diferencias, y a construir un mundo m√°s justo y solidario. - En √©l encontramos la paz que el mundo no puede dar, la esperanza que nos hace perseverar y la alegr√≠a que nos llena el coraz√≥n. - El amor de Jes√∫s es inagotable y su misericordia infinita, siempre dispuesto a perdonarnos y acogernos con brazos abiertos. - La resurrecci√≥n de Jes√∫s es la prueba de que Dios est√° con nosotros en todo momento. - La muerte de Jes√∫s es el camino hacia la reconciliaci√≥n con Dios y con nuestros hermanos y hermanas. - En Jes√∫s encontramos la verdad que nos libera y la luz que nos gu√≠a en medio de la oscuridad. - Para quienes creemos en ti, eres el camino que nos lleva a la plenitud de nuestra humanidad y nos da la vida en abundancia.

author: Defense World Staff
title: State of Alaska Department of Revenue Sells 1,133 Shares of Balchem Co. (NASDAQ:BCPC) - Defense World
text: State of Alaska Department of Revenue reduced its position in Balchem Co. ( NASDAQ:BCPC ‚Äì Free Report ) by 5.3% during the 3rd quarter, according to the company in its most recent 13F filing with the Securities & Exchange Commission. The firm owned 20,073 shares of the basic materials company‚Äôs stock after selling 1,133 shares during the quarter. State of Alaska Department of Revenue owned about 0.06% of Balchem worth $2,489,000 at the end of the most recent quarter. Several other hedge funds have also recently bought and sold shares of the company. Quantbot Technologies LP acquired a new stake in shares of Balchem in the 1st quarter valued at approximately $34,000. Gyon Technologies Capital Management LP acquired a new stake in shares of Balchem in the 4th quarter valued at approximately $56,000. Point72 Hong Kong Ltd acquired a new stake in shares of Balchem in the 1st quarter valued at approximately $67,000. Dark Forest Capital Management LP acquired a new stake in shares of Balchem in the 1st quarter valued at approximately $78,000. Finally, Point72 Middle East FZE acquired a new stake in shares of Balchem in the 4th quarter valued at approximately $84,000. 87.91% of the stock is owned by institutional investors. Balchem Stock Up 0.6 % NASDAQ:BCPC opened at $150.35 on Friday. The firm‚Äôs 50 day simple moving average is $128.36 and its 200 day simple moving average is $130.75. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.39, a current ratio of 3.16 and a quick ratio of 2.08. Balchem Co. has a one year low of $110.74 and a one year high of $150.82. The company has a market cap of $4.85 billion, a PE ratio of 47.13, a P/E/G ratio of 5.44 and a beta of 0.69. NASDAQ:BCPC ‚Äì Get Free Report ) last posted its earnings results on Friday, October 27th. The basic materials company reported $0.90 EPS for the quarter, missing the consensus estimate of $0.91 by ($0.01). Balchem had a return on equity of 10.48% and a net margin of 11.15%. The business had revenue of $229.95 million for the quarter, compared to analyst estimates of $238.47 million. On average, research analysts anticipate that Balchem Co. will post 3.41 earnings per share for the current year. Balchem Increases Dividend The company also recently declared an annual dividend, which will be paid on Friday, January 19th. Shareholders of record on Wednesday, December 27th will be issued a dividend of $0.79 per share. This is a positive change from Balchem‚Äôs previous annual dividend of $0.40. The ex-dividend date is Tuesday, December 26th. This represents a yield of 0.6%. Balchem‚Äôs dividend payout ratio (DPR) is presently 24.76%. Analysts Set New Price Targets A number of research firms have recently weighed in on BCPC. HC Wainwright reduced their price target on shares of Balchem from $165.00 to $135.00 and set a ‚Äúbuy‚Äù rating on the stock in a research note on Monday, October 30th. StockNews.com assumed coverage on shares of Balchem in a research report on Thursday, October 5th. They set a ‚Äúhold‚Äù rating on the stock. View Our Latest Stock Analysis on Balchem Balchem Company Profile Balchem Corporation develops, manufactures, and markets specialty performance ingredients and products for the nutritional, food, pharmaceutical, animal health, medical device sterilization, plant nutrition, and industrial markets in the United States and internationally. It operates through three segments: Human Nutrition and Health, Animal Nutrition and Health, and Specialty Products. author: @nomeusuario
title: Homem agride esposa na frente dos filhos, a leva pra UPA e √© preso | O Tempo
text: Um homem, de 31 anos, foi preso, na madrugada desta quinta-feira (8), numa Unidade de Pronto Atendimento (UPA) de Belo Horizonte. Ele √© suspeito de violentar sexualmente a esposa, de 29 anos, agredi-la e amea√ßa-la de morte na frente de um dos filhos do casal, de 9 anos. A viol√™ncia ocorreu na casa da fam√≠lia, no bairro Let√≠cia, na regi√£o de Venda Nova. Depois de cometer os abusos, a v√≠tima sofreu uma convuls√£o. Neste momento, o homem teria se arrependido de ter cometido as agress√µes e levou a companheira para uma UPA. Contudo, no local ele se arrependeu de ter prestado socorro para a esposa. Na pr√≥pria unidade de atendimento o suspeito tentou coagir com amea√ßas de morte a companheira para que ela n√£o contasse para os m√©dicos que havia sofrido diversos tipos de viol√™ncias. Entretanto, num momento em que o homem saiu de perto da v√≠tima ela conseguiu pedir ajuda aos pacientes que estavam no centro de sa√∫de. A Pol√≠cia Militar foi acionada e o homem foi preso. De acordo com a Pol√≠cia Civil, os atos violentos tiveram in√≠cio porque o homem estava desconfiado que estava sendo tra√≠do pela esposa. Em casa, o suspeito violentou a mulher sexualmente. Na sequ√™ncia, ele a agrediu. Para fugir das agress√µes a mulher saiu do quarto e tentou se refugiar na sala de casa. Munido de uma faca, o homem foi atr√°s da v√≠tima. Nesse momento, um dos filhos do casal - um menino, de 9 anos - pediu para que o pai n√£o agredisse a m√£e. Ap√≥s o apelo do filho, aparentemente transtornado o homem amea√ßou que mataria a fam√≠lia inteira. Em seguida, ele apertou o pesco√ßo da esposa, e, nesse momento, a mulher teve uma crise convulsiva. Ap√≥s a crise, o suspeito aparentemente arrependido de cometer as agress√µes, levou a esposa para uma UPA. Por√©m, no local ele come√ßou a coagir a esposa e amea√ßa-la de morte. A v√≠tima conseguiu pedir ajuda aos pacientes da unidade de sa√∫de. A Pol√≠cia Militar foi acionada. "Mesmo na presen√ßa dos agentes de seguran√ßa o homem continuou amea√ßar a esposa de morte dizendo que teria se arrependido e poderia ter terminado o 'servi√ßo', detalhou a delegada Marina Prado.

author: Get News
title: The Go-To Experts at Private School Path Provide Leading Commentary and Advice on Private School Admissions | Markets | bigspringherald.com
text:
Ways You Can Master Private School Admissions: Expert Tips for Interviews, Tests (ISEE, HSPT, SSAT) and Applications. The private school admission process is an intricate and multifaceted journey that often leaves parents and students feeling overwhelmed. Selecting the right school and acing the interviews are crucial steps in making an application stand out. To help demystify the process, we spoke with industry leaders in private school admissions, Private School Path , for the most current and up-to-date insights and tips.
"An admission decision is not just about the student‚Äôs academic performance; it‚Äôs about finding a mutual fit where the student can thrive and contribute to the school community ." This statement underscores the importance of aligning personal values with those of the prospective schools.
Understanding standardized tests such as the ISEE, SSAT, and HSPT is often a vital part of the admission process. Preparing well in advance, understanding the test format, and taking practice tests can help students perform their best. Crafting a personal statement should reflect the student's individuality and align with the school's ethos. Authenticity, clarity, and connecting the narrative with the school's values can set an application apart.
Preparing for interviews is also key, as they allow schools to see beyond grades and test scores. Being genuine, confident, and well-prepared for potential questions can make a positive impression. It's important to highlight academic and extracurricular achievements; schools value both academic excellence and well-roundedness. Consistent grades and meaningful engagement in extracurricular activities can add depth to an application.
Researching schools' values and culture is crucial as well. Tailoring applications to resonate with each school's unique culture and values shows a genuine interest and can be a distinguishing factor.
Navigating the private school admission process requires careful planning, insight into what schools are looking for, and an authentic portrayal of the student's abilities and interests. It is a complex journey that can be made smoother with the right approach and, when needed, professional guidance from recognized experts in the field.
Those interested in exploring more about the private school admission process or seeking specialized assistance can find resources and services from the industry experts at Private School Path .

author: CNN Newsource
title: Massive California waves injure some onlookers and bring flooding, treacherous beach conditions up the West coast
text:
Massive California waves injure some onlookers and bring flooding, treacherous beach conditions up the West coast
By Elizabeth Wolfe, Robert Shackelford and Cindy Von Quednow, CNN
(CNN) ‚Äî A powerful offshore storm is
driving towering waves into the California coastline, triggering flooding and warnings of dangerous and damaging swells after several people were injured by a wave along Ventura beach on Thursday.
The wave crashed over a barrier along the southern California beach, tossing a wall of fast-moving water at a group of onlookers who rushed to escape the deluge, witness video shows. Seawater quickly knocked some people off their feet and pummeled cars as drivers tried to speed away.
Nearly 20 people were briefly swept away in the incident and eight people were taken to the hospital, Ventura officials said.
High water and dangerous rip currents will churn along some of California‚Äôs beaches through the weekend as much of the West coast ‚Äì spanning from the US-Mexico border to southern Oregon ‚Äì is under coastal flood and high-surf alerts, the National Weather Service said.
Waves as high as telephone poles ‚Äì about 40 feet ‚Äì could slam into San Francisco through Friday morning. Fifteen to 20-foot waves are expected along the central coast.
The dangerous conditions pose an ‚Äúexceptional risk‚Äù of ocean drowning and damage to structures like piers and jetties, the National Weather Service said.
The spectacular waters have enthralled some surfers and onlookers, but weather officials are cautioning that the waves and strong rip tides can be perilous for those nearby.
‚ÄúLarge breaking waves can cause injury, wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize small boats near shore,‚Äù the National Weather Service warned.
At least one fisherman fell overboard in a harbor off Oxnard and later came ashore uninjured, the Ventura County Fire Department said.
The conditions have already caused some road closures and evacuations in coastal California communities and prompted the rescue of five campers along the San Luis Obispo coast.
Crews in Ventura worked through the night to reinforce a mile-long sand barrier that was damaged by powerful waters on Thursday, the local fire department said. Standing about seven feet tall, the raised wall helps protect beachside communities.
Hoping to discourage spectators, local officials closed a main access point to Ventura Pier, which saw a swell of about 20 feet on Thursday. Some coastal streets in the area have also been closed as a precaution.
In central California‚Äôs Santa Cruz, the sheriff‚Äôs office
issued an evacuation warning for some areas on Thursday, which included areas of Rio Del Mar, where seawater filled beachside roadways and pushed against some homes, CNN affiliate KION reported. The warnings were lifted later in the day.
The most extreme impacts were expected along the central and Ventura County coasts, along with Hermosa, Manhattan and Palos Verdes beaches, the weather service in Los Angeles said Thursday.
Tempestuous waters are also battering Northern California, where the Bay Area could see waves of 28 to 33 feet, the weather service advised.
A high wind alert is also in effect for the Bay Area on Friday as wind gusts of up to 50 mph are expected.
Rainfall is likely to stretch northward from the Bay Area throughout the day Friday before shifting south into the weekend.
Massive waves attract surfers to Mavericks
Despite safety warnings, the massive waves are a welcome sight to surfers hungry to tackle the legendary swells at Mavericks Beach, about 25 miles south of San Francisco.
Pro surfers and spectators flocked to the beach on Thursday for a competition at the site known for having
some of the biggest waves in the world, CNN affiliate KGO reported.
Local resident Ion Banner
told the affiliate that surfers from Brazil, Tahiti and Hawaii were out in the water. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs pretty gnarly, it‚Äôs super big,‚Äù he said.
‚ÄúThe waves looked absolutely massive and it was everything that we expected,‚Äù said Miguel Blanco, who told KGO he flew in from Portugal to surf the waves. ‚ÄúIt was really big, I‚Äôd say 40-60 foot waves.‚Äù
Mavericks‚Äô jaw-dropping waves ‚Äì caused by unique underwater rock formations ‚Äì reach their biggest heights in the winter, when big wave surfers from all over the world make pilgrimages to face the swells.
The legendary waves and the surfers who brave them have been the subject of several films and documentaries, including the 2012 biopic ‚ÄúChasing Mavericks‚Äù about American surfer Jay Moriarity‚Äôs journey to surf Mavericks as a teen.
On Thursday, the conditions were prime for surfers like Blanco.
‚ÄúIf it‚Äôs your turn, you just gotta go,‚Äù Blanco said. ‚ÄúWhen you see a big wave, you‚Äôre kinda scared but at the same time you‚Äôre feeling like you should go and you just go and enjoy the ride.‚Äù
CNN‚Äôs David Williams contributed to this report.
The-CNN-Wire

author: Christian Collado
title: ¬øTikTok no funciona? Algunos usuarios reportan problemas con la red social en Espa√±a
text:
Redes sociales
¬øTikTok no funciona? Algunos usuarios reportan problemas con la red social en Espa√±a
Desde hace algunos minutos, los usuarios de la red social est√°n avisando sobre la incapacidad de ver o publicar contenido
TikTok no parece haber comenzado con buen pie este jueves. La red social china parece estar atravesando problemas que impiden a los usuarios usar la app con normalidad desde hace algunos minutos.
Plataformas como DownDetector, que registran las "ca√≠das" de las principales plataformas y servicios, se han inundado de quejas por parte de usuarios de diferentes partes del mundo, que indican que no pueden cargar nuevo contenido en el feed, ni tampoco subir el suyo propio.
Si no puedes usar TikTok desde hace unos minutos, no est√°s solo
De momento, se desconoce el alcance dela ca√≠da, pero todo parece indicar que Espa√±a es uno de los pa√≠ses afectados, si bien una buena parte de los usuarios del servicio pueden seguir us√°ndolo con normalidad.
Por tanto, parece que no se trata de un fallo generalizado, sino que es m√°s bien un error puntual que parece afectar a un n√∫mero determinado de usuarios. Aquellos que no pueden usar la red social, reportan estar viendo un aviso en el que se especifica que "No hay conexi√≥n a Internet", a pesar de que otras aplicaciones funcionan con normalidad.
Lo m√°s probable es que el problema acabe siendo solucionado en pocos minutos, y que en breve los usuarios puedan volver a ver y subir contenido con normalidad.
Noticia en desarrollo. Actualiza la p√°gina para leer las √∫ltimas novedades.
